T10D4199:152b-1: stha b'i ro pa ni mantra nam /
T10D4199:152b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T10D4199:152b-5: btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol /
T10D4199:152b-15: padma'i rtsa lag ltar dri ma med par mdzod la /
T10D4199:152b-16: rlung gi stobs kyis shing gi lcug phran bskyod pa dang /
T10D4199:152b-17: smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang /
T10D4199:152b-21: ba glang gi phru gu'i rna mchog dang /
T10D4199:152b-24: rgya mtsho bskyod pa'i rlabs ltar g-yo ba'i yid /
T10D4199:152b-25: skad cig re re la yang mi sdod par 'gro
T10D4199:152b-26: brtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yud
T10D4199:152b-27: tsam zhig rgyu ba nang du dgag tu gsol /
T10D4199:152b-29: ri gzar 'bab pa'i dba' rlabs gyur pas kyang //
T10D4199:152b-30: gang gi dba' rlabs 'gyur la bsgrun med par //
T10D4199:152b-31: 'jig pa thogs med g-yo ba'i yid de ni //
T10D4199:152b-32: yud tsam rtse gcig mdzod cig btsun pa rnams //
T10D4199:152b-33: lha yi bu mo yi chad shugs phyung skad cig zim mar byas pa'i mig ;
T10D4199:152b-34: / ring zhing rdzir ldan bkra la 'od 'tsher mig chags lta ba'i g-yo ba yis //
T10D4199:152b-35: gang gi thugs ni skye rgyun gcod pa las 'khrungs g-yos par ma gyur pa /
T10D4199:152b-36: bdud kyi dpung 'joms mkhas gcig thams cad mkhyen pa
T10D4199:152b-37: de la phyag mdzod cig / skye ldan gang zhig
T10D4199:153a-1: gnas sems can dmyal zhi dang //
T10D4199:153a-2: yi dags 'jig rten gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur sdug bsngal 'jig byed pa //
T10D4199:153a-3: 'khor bdag na 'gro ba chen po rnams kyi grogs gyur 'phags gcig po //
T10D4199:153a-4: zhi bde 'gro de'i sgor gzhol chos de la ni gus pas brten par mdzod //
T10D4199:153a-5: zhi ba'i bdag nyid gang zhig bde gshegs gsung rab mthar phyin 'byung smra zhing //
T10D4199:153a-6: gang la gus par cung zad tsam zhig byin yang sbyin pa 'phel 'gyur la /
T10D4199:153a-7: ye shes snang bas mun pa zad byas dge slong dge 'dun de la ni //
T10D4199:153a-8: nyon mongs gcad pa'i ched du thams cad kyis kyang
T10D4199:153a-9: gus par phyag mdzod cig / lcang lo chun po'i
T10D4199:153a-10: skra mang mgo la thogs shing dpung mgo gnyis g-yogs
T10D4199:153a-11: la // rang gi 'od zer phyogs mthar 'phro ba rnams kyis 'jig rten kun 'gengs pa /
T10D4199:153a-12: lha dbang brgya byin cod pan btud de tshangs la phyag byas gang yin de //
T10D4199:153a-13: byin nas dga' byas sems kyi ting 'dzin shin tu chen po'i 'bras bu yin //
T10D4199:153a-14: rdo rje 'od 'phro'i phreng bas dpung rgyan 'dres nas mdzes gyur cing //
T10D4199:153a-15: lha la bka' stsol dbang po mtho ris skyong ba gang yin pa //
T10D4199:153a-16: de dag dge ba dag 'byung rnam smin 'gyur dus nyams dga' zhing //
T10D4199:153a-17: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu rnams yin //
T10D4199:153a-18: kha nas rgyags 'gyur dri zhim 'byung zhing mig gi mtha' dmar la //
T10D4199:153a-19: dbugs 'byung do shal g-yos pas nu ma 'bur la 'drud byed pa //
T10D4199:153a-20: sdu gu lhan cig nor bdag dga' tshal 'dug pa gang yin pa //
T10D4199:153a-21: de yang 'gro ba nyams dga' sbyin pa'i bdag nyid chen po yin //
T10D4199:153a-22: 'brug sgra sgrogs shing sprin rnams chu ni kun du len byed pa //
T10D4199:153a-23: rlabs 'byung dus na nor bu byi ru dung dang nya phyis 'byung //
T10D4199:153a-24: rin chen gnas nang chu lha nyid kyi 'byor pas gang bsrung ba //
T10D4199:153a-25: der yang rgyu ni sbyin pa mchog ces thub pas bka' stsal to //
T10D4199:153a-26: gang yang 'od zer rnams kyis mkha' la skar ma'i 'khor lo zil mnan cing //
T10D4199:153a-27: ku mu ta yi rdzing yangs rnams su dpal ni rab tu rnam phye nas //
T10D4199:153a-28: glang po'i mche ba'i dpal dang ldan zhing mtshan mo shin tu rab mdzes pa //
T10D4199:153a-29: de yang nges par sbyin pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ro bro mang po yin //
T10D4199:153a-30: ri rab rtse la shing rtas lam kha 'dug pa'i rin chen rdo gcog cing //
T10D4199:153a-31: rta yi rkang lag rnams kyis dgu tshigs chu bo'i rlabs ni gcod byed la //
T10D4199:153b-0: @153b mun pa bsal phyir nyi mas skar ma zil mnan lham me gang yin pa //
T10D4199:153b-1: de rgyu yid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa'i sbyin par thub pas gsungs //
T10D4199:153b-2: rgyal mtshan rtse btags rin chen 'od zer snang bas nam mkha' dmar gyur cing //
T10D4199:153b-3: rta rmig 'dor bas mkha' la sprin gyi phreng ba dag kyang 'dral byed la ;
T10D4199:153b-4: / rnga yab dkar pos g-yabs shing 'khor los sgyur ba song ba gang yin pa //
T10D4199:153b-5: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de yang sbyin pas bsgrubs zhes thub pas bka' stsal to //
T10D4199:153b-6: gser gyi padma'i rdul gyi bye mas dmar bris mtshor ni khrus byas te //
T10D4199:153b-7: de ni nags 'dab bung ba sgra 'byin rnams su nyal ba'i bde rnyed nas ;
T10D4199:153b-8: / rig 'dzin chung ma lhan cig 'jigs med mkha' las 'gro ba gang yin pa //
T10D4199:153b-9: de yang ser sna 'jil zhing skyon med dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i gzi brjid yin //
T10D4199:153b-10: ma la ya yi ri rtser tsandan grib mas bsil ba yangs pa dang //
T10D4199:153b-11: 'bigs byed ri dang gangs dang lhun po'i ri dang man da ra ba'i ri bo la ;
T10D4199:153b-12: / grub pa'i tshogs chen chung ma lhan cig 'jigs bral dga' ba gang yin pa //
T10D4199:153b-13: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di'i snying po 'byor pa de yang gtong bas yin //
T10D4199:153b-14: bud med rkang gdub 'khrol bas 'grogs nas 'phur ba'i phu ron gnas pa yin //
T10D4199:153b-15: khang pa mthon po rnams dang 'bigs byed ri rtse 'gran pa'i ban glang dang //
T10D4199:153b-16: gdugs dang rda yab bud med g-yog 'khor rin chen gser dang rta rnams dang /
T10D4199:153b-17: bzang mdzes de dag kun kyang sngon gyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rnam smin yin /
T10D4199:153b-18: bandu ka ltar rtsa dmar rgyun chang gser snod bzang por legs blugs pa /
T10D4199:153b-19: yongs dag aa mra smin gas lta bur dri zhim autpal 'gying zhing ldem //
T10D4199:153b-20: na chung gshin ma nam dgos dus kyis stobs shing yams grangs mang 'drim pa //
T10D4199:153b-21: mchog tu dge ba de rgyu sbyin pa yin zhes blo gros dag pas gsungs //
T10D4199:153b-22: gser gyi phag skas rkeng bcings snyan smra 'jam zhing smin ma ya gcig bskyod //
T10D4199:153b-23: mig yangs rnar thug dkar nag 'byes la skra bkab me tog phreng dkris pa'i //
T10D4199:153b-24: na chung bzang mo bral rgyas bdag nyid legs byas rnams kyi bran ltar byed //
T10D4199:153b-25: tshogs bsags 'bras de sbyin pa'i che ba nyid ces zas gtsang sras pos gsungs //
T10D4199:154a-0: de lta lags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mtha' dag thugs @154a * //
T10D4199:154a-1: su chud pa shin tu rgyas pa'i chu ltar gyur pa snying po dri ma med pa dang /
T10D4199:154a-2: lha'i skye bo dang klu'i gnas su gyur pa /
T10D4199:154a-3: tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin zhing rgya che ba'i chu dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:154a-4: dge ba la rnam par rtog pa'i zla ba shar ba'i dbang gis //
T10D4199:154a-5: ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs rgyas pa'i dus kyi rlabs
T10D4199:154a-6: gyis byang chub kyi yan lag skyon med pa'i nor
T10D4199:154a-7: bu mang po kun du g-yengs pa /
T10D4199:154a-8: sems kyi 'og gzhi la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ri bo chen po brtan pa /
T10D4199:154a-9: 'bras bu'i bye brag thob pa gang zag chen po'i chu srin rgyu ba /
T10D4199:154a-11: yang dag par spong ba dang /
T10D4199:154a-12: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i shing 'jon pas mdzes par byas pa /
T10D4199:154a-13: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngogs dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:154a-14: sgrib pa'i ro mi gnas pa /
T10D4199:154a-15: sbyangs pa'i yon tan gsom pa dag pa'i mu tig gi nya phyis kyi log lus dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:154a-16: mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid gting mi dpogs shing zab pa /
T10D4199:154a-17: rgyun mi 'chad par klog pa dang kha ton byed pa'i sgra rgya cher 'byung ba /
T10D4199:154a-18: 'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rgya mtsho chen po la bdag gsol ba 'tshal lo //
T10D4199:154a-20: srid pa'i 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dum nas dge ba'i sa bon btab pa /
T10D4199:154a-21: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa gzhal med khang gis gzhi gcig pur gyur pa /
T10D4199:154a-22: bzod pa dang des pa dang byams pa dang /
T10D4199:154a-23: tshul khrims dang thos pa dang zhi ba'i gnas /
T10D4199:154a-24: bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung gi don gyi de kho na ma lus par rtogs pa /
T10D4199:154a-25: yongs su shes pas bsgoms pas dran pa nye bar
T10D4199:154a-26: gnas pa yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong bas log
T10D4199:154a-27: par lta ba'i rab rib bsal ba /
T10D4199:154a-28: legs par brjod cing shis la rgya che ba'i mig
T10D4199:154a-29: dang ldan pa skye bo bla ma la bsnyen bkur
T10D4199:154a-30: byed pa dang mngon du smra ba dang /
T10D4199:154a-31: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i tshul bzang po dang
T10D4199:154a-32: ldan zhing mdongs gsol che bas snyan pa rnams bskyed
T10D4199:154a-33: pa / ston gyi zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer dag pa lta bu'i yid 'byung ba /
T10D4199:154a-34: sbyin bdag chen po che ba'i bdag nyid can ming
T10D4199:154a-35: 'di zhes bya ba 'di ni khyim bdag legs sbyin
T10D4199:154b-0: @154b nam gru la sogs pa dang /
T10D4199:154b-1: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la yid mgon par dad pas /
T10D4199:154b-5: gtum po rab snang la sogs pa sa'i steng la
T10D4199:154b-6: dbang ba'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i legs par spyad
T10D4199:154b-15: ri'i 'bab chu ltar g-yo bar ri gnas /
T10D4199:154b-16: stobs bcu mnga' bas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T10D4199:154b-19: mdo sde 'dzin cing dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu
T10D4199:154b-20: rnam par smin pa yod do zhes bsod nams kyi
T10D4199:154b-21: sa bon skyed pa'i rgyu 'khro ba'i bde ba phun
T10D4199:154b-23: skye bo ngan pas rnyed par dka' ba ser sna
T10D4199:154b-24: can gyi yid 'joms pa sgrub pa ni ston ka'i
T10D4199:154b-25: zla ba dri ma med pa ltar dang ba'i thugs
T10D4199:154b-26: mnga' ba / srid pa'i sa bon nyon mongs pa gcod pa /
T10D4199:154b-27: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen pa /
T10D4199:154b-28: grags pa 'jig rten gsum du khyab pas bdud kyi bu mo steg pa rgyun gcod pa'i rgyu /
T10D4199:154b-31: 'gro ba la dge pa'i phyir bya dka' ba'i phrin las rnams kyis /
T10D4199:154b-32: chos thams cad thugs su chud pas rnam par sangs
T10D4199:154b-33: rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang
T10D4199:154b-35: padma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa ltar ring zhing rdzi ma legs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:154b-36: gnod sbyin gyi bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu chen
T10D4199:154b-37: pos zhabs kyi sor mo kun tu bskor ba gser
T10D4199:154b-38: gyi mchod sdong ltar gsal ba /
T10D4199:154b-45: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyi mtshan mnga' ba /
T10D4199:154b-46: padma'i 'byung gnas rnams la snang ba mdzad pa'i 'od
T10D4199:154b-47: kyi phreng ba bye brag med par khyab pa rgyas
T10D4199:154b-48: par 'gengs pa / bung pa'i tshogs ltar sngo ba'i
T10D4199:154b-49: gtsug tor gyi nang nas kun du 'byung ba'i 'od
T10D4199:154b-50: kyi dra bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus par
T10D4199:154b-52: kha na ma tho ba med par zhugs pa /
T10D4199:154b-54: zhi par gzhol ba'i lam du 'dren pa /
T10D4199:154b-56: mnyes gshin pa'i gnyen gcig pu /
T10D4199:155a-1: pa'i rgol ba rnams kyis gsung dang thugs dang dpal dang /
T10D4199:155a-4: yul rnams kun la sred pa 'byung ba'i rgyun rnams skems pa'i rgyu //
T10D4199:155a-5: skye bo mkhas pa rnams ni sad par bya phyir shar gyur ba //
T10D4199:155a-6: bag la nyal gyi rab rib sel ba ye shes
T10D4199:155a-7: snang ba'i mchog / sa rnams mtha' dag snang bas
T10D4199:155a-8: phyogs rnams thams cad snang mdzad pa //
T10D4199:155a-9: phyag dang zhabs dang dbu ni rab tu byin zhing tshul khrims dang //
T10D4199:155a-10: smon lam dag gis byang chub lam bzang yang dag bsgrubs gyur pa //
T10D4199:155a-11: srid pa'i 'gro ba'i dug gi snye ma'i steng du lhung ba'o //
T10D4199:155a-12: skye dgu rnams la kha na ma tho ba med pa ston par mdzad pa /
T10D4199:155a-13: srid pa rnam pa gsum 'jig pa /
T10D4199:155a-14: bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:155a-16: dpa' ba dang mthu kha na ma tho ba med pa /
T10D4199:155a-17: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pas sku brjid pa /
T10D4199:155a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang dka' ba brgya
T10D4199:155a-19: phrag du mas dam pa'i chos dkon mchog bsgrubs pa
T10D4199:155a-20: / brtsal ba tsam gyis sems can mtha' dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud pa /
T10D4199:155a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rab tu zhi ba dang /
T10D4199:155a-27: sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:155a-28: nyon mongs pa'i rab rib dang ling tog ma lus par bsal ba /
T10D4199:155a-29: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin rig pa dang phyogs dang phyogs kyi gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4199:155a-38: shing gi grib ma rnam pa sna tshogs la dgyes pa /
T10D4199:155a-39: yul dang ljongs du ma la phan gdags par rtsol ba mdzad pa /
T10D4199:155a-40: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
T10D4199:155a-42: dga' ba thob pa las ma nyams pa /
T10D4199:155a-43: phung po lnga'i phyir skad cig yang dag par so sor rtog pa'i yid la byed pa bskyed pa /
T10D4199:155a-51: de lta bu byung ba dang /
T10D4199:155a-52: gtan la dbab pa'i gtam gyis sems sbyangs pa /
T10D4199:155b-1: yid kyi 'jug pa dran pa nye bar gnas par rgyu ba //
T10D4199:155b-4: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T10D4199:155b-7: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa goms pas
T10D4199:155b-8: dad pa thob pa la tshe rabs gzhan dang gzhan
T10D4199:155b-9: nas bsags pa'i dge ba'i rnam par smin pas grub
T10D4199:155b-10: pa / ji ltar 'byor pas nus pa dang mthun pa'i rtsom pas tshogs bsags pa /
T10D4199:155b-11: phan yon lnga'i rgyu sems can thams cad gnas par byed pa /
T10D4199:155b-12: 'jig rten pha rol du bde ba thob par byed pa /
T10D4199:155b-13: kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba /
T10D4199:155b-14: gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang /
T10D4199:155b-18: gzhibs pa la sogs pa zhal zas bsham par bya
T10D4199:155b-19: ba rnam pa sna tshogs zhal zas khyad par can
T10D4199:155b-21: de la thog mar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i tshe /
T10D4199:155b-22: gang dag ye shes kyi mes nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad ma lus par bsregs pa /
T10D4199:155b-23: gtong ba'i ngang tshul can gyis sbyin pa'i sa bon 'phel ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
T10D4199:155b-26: de kho na la bsgoms pa 'di lta ste /
T10D4199:155b-27: gnas brtan bha ra dhva dza bsod snyoms len dang /
T10D4199:155b-31: skyed byed dang gser be'u dang /
T10D4199:155b-33: rdo rje can gyi bu dang /
T10D4199:155b-35: klu sde la sogs pa slob ma bstan pa gnas
T10D4199:155b-36: par bya ba'i phyir gnod par gyur kyang lus kyi
T10D4199:155b-38: gzhan yang gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i skye bo la phan pa'i phyir /
T10D4199:155b-39: gser gyi rdo leb chen po'i steng na 'dug pa'i
T10D4199:155b-40: rig sngags 'chang du ma glu len pas glang po
T10D4199:155b-41: che yur ba / bung ba'i mchus padma la 'jib
T10D4199:155b-42: cing 'khod pa'i manda ka'i rdzing gi chu dang ldan
T10D4199:155b-43: zhing yal ga gsal ba'i steng na rin po che'i
T10D4199:155b-44: me tog gi phreng ba bres pa'i shing yongs 'dus
T10D4199:155b-45: kun du mdzes par byas pa'i ri'i lhun po 'bab
T10D4199:155b-46: chu 'bab pa'i sa gzhi la 'khod pa rnams dang
T10D4199:155b-47: che yur ba / / yang na gang dag / gser ri'i dkyil nas bsil ba'i chu 'bab la //
T10D4199:155b-48: chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'byung 'gyur zhing //
T10D4199:155b-49: zla ba'i 'od kyis ku mud kha phye ste //
T10D4199:155b-50: ku mud tshal na skad snyan dang pa gnas //
T10D4199:155b-51: ngang mo mtshe'u na sgra skad snyan pa 'byin //
T10D4199:156a-1: ngogs rma bya dga' bcas rgyags par gnas //
T10D4199:156a-2: rma bya rgyags sgras ri sul snyan par grags //
T10D4199:156a-3: ri sul yal ga lhags pas ri rtse 'khrigs //
T10D4199:156a-4: ri rtse stod rnams na ni sprin chags la //
T10D4199:156a-5: lang ling sprin gyi sman ljongs khra khro snang //
T10D4199:156a-6: sman ljongs skyes pa'i nor bu ldum bu gsal //
T10D4199:156a-7: ldum bu las brul lhung ba'i me tog ldan //
T10D4199:156a-8: me tog rgyas pa'i dpag bsam shing tshal mdzes //
T10D4199:156a-9: mdzes pa'i lha mo gser gyi pag skad drung //
T10D4199:156a-10: gser gyi phag skad sgras ni bya 'drogs shing //
T10D4199:156a-11: byas 'chos shing thog rtsa las chad cing grul //
T10D4199:156a-12: rtsa 'phyang khu ba zags pa spos kyi dri //
T10D4199:156a-13: spos glang dbang po dregs brag dri rab zhim //
T10D4199:156a-14: dri rab zhim ba'i li shi ri 'khor mang //
T10D4199:156a-15: ban glang mo rgyags drag 'gro lang long gyur //
T10D4199:156a-16: bung ba'i khyu yis me tog zegs gyur cing //
T10D4199:156a-17: yal ga me tog rgyas pas gad pa dkar //
T10D4199:156a-18: gad pa chad pas nor bu'i ldum bu snang //
T10D4199:156a-19: me tog mgo lcogs bral bas rnam par bkra //
T10D4199:156a-20: nor bu sil ma mod pos ri gzhol spras //
T10D4199:156a-21: me tog zegs pa'i shing gi yal gar gnas pa'i bud ba dga' bas 'phur rnams dang //
T10D4199:156a-22: zla pa'i 'od zer dkar po dad pa lta bus nye 'khor rdo ba chag chag btab //
T10D4199:156a-23: lhun po mtho ba'i ril thub pa gang dag rab tu zhi ba'i thugs kyis bzhugs //
T10D4199:156a-24: de dag dri med zla 'dra'i grags ldan 'di yi spyin pa'i gnas la brten du gsol //
T10D4199:156a-25: rgya mtsho'i nye ba'i chu 'gram ri ro ma la ya'i //
T10D4199:156a-26: ri bos[?] ta mal spal mig 'thon pa'i phreng ba can //
T10D4199:156a-27: sbrul mang 'khris pa'i tsandan shing gi nags tshal na //
T10D4199:156a-28: brten pa gang dag bzhugs par gyur pa de dag dang //
T10D4199:156a-29: nyi ma'i rta yi rmig pas rdo bcag cing //
T10D4199:156a-30: mi 'am ci yi bu mo phrugs kyis nyams dga' la //
T10D4199:156a-31: ri sul mthon po dpag bsam nags mang dang /
T10D4199:156a-32: ri 'gab rnams na gang dag bzhugs pa dang //
T10D4199:156a-33: shing gi me tog 'phrul pas dri zhim byas pa'i ser bu dad ldang zhing //
T10D4199:156a-34: nags na glang po dregs pa zag pas bsgos pa'i rin chen 'khri shing khyim //
T10D4199:156a-35: khyim la chags pa med pa'i lha yis bstan pa'i
T10D4199:156a-36: bsod nams chu gling gi / gnya' shing 'dzin khri
T10D4199:156a-37: bya rgyal khyung gnas pa na gang dag bzhugs pa
T10D4199:156a-38: dang // ba glang mos bsnyogs snang ba rtsu ba 'gyur tshal //
T10D4199:156a-39: me tog ldan zhing ser bu dad ldan pa //
T10D4199:156b-0: sa hya ri bo @156b ngos rab yangs pa la //
T10D4199:156b-1: yang dag thugs mnga' thub pa bzhugs dgu dang //
T10D4199:156b-2: padma autpa la rgyas pa 'byung ba'i gnas //
T10D4199:156b-3: nyin re nyi ma'i shing rtas rdo snad can //
T10D4199:156b-4: srid pa'i 'jigs bral rab tu yid 'ong ba //
T10D4199:156b-5: 'char ba'i ri stengs gang dag bzhugs pa dang //
T10D4199:156b-6: ri yi rtse mos sngo bsangs sprin thal sman ljongs can //
T10D4199:156b-7: ngogs ldan chu bo man da ras ni ri sul bkrus //
T10D4199:156b-8: glang chen myos pas bsnyogs pas sa phyogs rlog pa'i ri //
T10D4199:156b-9: 'bigs byed rma bya rgyags gnas pa na bzhugs dgu dang //
T10D4199:156b-10: sna tshogs 'byung khung tshon gyis kha bsgyur phug dang ldan zhing sprin kyang chags gyur la //
T10D4199:156b-11: ko lpags ldan pa gtsang ma'i chu yis ngogs kyi rdo ba mang po bkrus gyur cing //
T10D4199:156b-12: ngos la ba lang mjug ma mong po dag gis 'phyang zhing glog 'gyus snang byas pa //
T10D4199:156b-13: yongs 'dus ri rtse phrag na gcig pu sred dang bral ba gang dag bzhugs pa dang /
T10D4199:156b-15: gang dag shing dang 'khri shing rnam pa mang po 'dab chags par gnas pa /
T10D4199:156b-16: ne'u gseng 'jam la sngo pa'i steng na rma bya'i khyu gar byed cing sgra snyad pa 'byin pa /
T10D4199:156b-17: ri dags kyi tshogs bag yangs gnas pa'i sos bcad pa'i rtsva'i myu gu yod pa /
T10D4199:156b-18: me tog dri zhim pos bsgom pa'i ser bu 'jam
T10D4199:156b-19: zhing bsil ba'i ngad ldang ba'i nags 'dab rnams su
T10D4199:156b-20: gnas bcas te bzhugs pa rnams dang /
T10D4199:156b-22: gang dag dus su rlabs 'byung pa'i chu'i dpa' rlabs
T10D4199:156b-23: kyis g-yengs pa'i na le sham dang li shi dang
T10D4199:156b-24: la ba kha'i 'bras bu sngon po mang po 'khrigs
T10D4199:156b-25: pa'i tshal dang / aa ka ru'i shing khrod na
T10D4199:156b-26: gnas pa'i sprul mgo'i gdengs ka gdengs shing 'jigs su
T10D4199:156b-28: glang po che dregs pa dang bcas pa'i gnas byu ru'i sdong bu bsgyel ba dang ldan zhing /
T10D4199:156b-29: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis reg pa'i dbang gis mu
T10D4199:156b-30: tig yod pa'i nya phyis kha bye ba'i khog pas
T10D4199:156b-31: rnam par spras pa nye bar 'bul ba dang ldan
T10D4199:156b-32: pa / nor bu mchog gi rdo las grub pa'i
T10D4199:156b-33: chung ma'i skye bo gnas shing bya'i khyu dga' ste
T10D4199:156b-34: sgra 'byin pas glu len pa lta bu yod pa'i
T10D4199:156b-36: klu'i bdag po'i lus chen pos sku dkris te /
T10D4199:156b-37: gdengs ka'i gdugs kyis nyi ma'i 'od zer bsgribs shing bsam gtan mdzad pa rnams dang /
T10D4199:156b-38: sman ljongs dag na phyogs kyi glang chen brang gis rdo ba khebs pa'i khyu 'khod cing /
T10D4199:157a-0: khyor bcas lan cig ma yin ra @157a * //
T10D4199:157a-1: ror gyur pa'i gnod sbyin mo dag gnas gyur la //
T10D4199:157a-2: klu yi rgyal po mgo bo stong de kha nas me 'bar 'byung bas shing sreg cing //
T10D4199:157a-3: gangs ri ti se la ni blo gtsang gang dag zhal ton mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang //
T10D4199:157a-4: rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis bshal ba'i ri bo 'gab ldan ma smad pa //
T10D4199:157a-5: ri bo man da ra la nyin phyed tshun chad bzhugs bzhugs shing //
T10D4199:157a-6: nyi ma phyed par gyur nas gang dag gzhan du bzhugs pa'i phyir //
T10D4199:157a-7: nor bu'i rtse mo bkram pa'i 'khor yug ri la brten pa dang //
T10D4199:157a-8: gang dag 'khri shing gzhon nus rdo ba khebs gyur pa'i //
T10D4199:157a-9: dbang chen rtse mo yid du 'ong bar bder gnas te //
T10D4199:157a-10: mkha' lding shugs kyis nang du klu rnams dkrugs pa yi //
T10D4199:157a-11: rgya mtsho rin chen gnas la rnam par gzigs pa dang //
T10D4199:157a-12: ngang pa'i tshogs can shin tu gtsang ba drag 'bab char gyi chu yis ri 'gab bkrus gyur cing //
T10D4199:157a-13: phyogs kyi glang pos bsgyel ba'i sa la ki yis rdo ba chen po mang po khebs gyur la //
T10D4199:157a-14: gcan gzan dbang po ral pa 'khyil zhing gsal bas dpung pa'i phyogs 'bar nyal bas gang gyur cing //
T10D4199:157a-15: sbal mig mthon pa'i lcug mas 'khor bas grub pa ngal sos ri bo kron dzar gang gshegs dang //
T10D4199:157a-16: gang dag mun bsal khyad par can gyi blos //
T10D4199:157a-17: shing ljon sna tshogs me tog rgyas gyur cing //
T10D4199:157a-18: ri dags rgyu bas ne'u gseng gzhon snang ba //
T10D4199:157a-19: gzi rdo nags rnams mi spong bzhugs pa dang //
T10D4199:157a-20: yang gang dag nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /
T10D4199:157a-22: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang gling gzhan dag na
T10D4199:157a-23: skyes pa'i lcug phran mdog snum zhing sngo la 'jam
T10D4199:157a-24: pa mang pos sa gzhi kun du khebs pa /
T10D4199:157a-25: shing gi grib ma'i dkyil 'khor bsil ba dang /
T10D4199:157a-26: khri shing gis 'khor zhing ri dags mang po gnas
T10D4199:157a-27: pa'i nags tshal de dang de dag na bzhugs pa
T10D4199:157a-28: rnams dang / yang gang dag dar dang /
T10D4199:157a-41: kun ti ma la ba dang /
T10D4199:157b-2: tsam pa ka dang rgyal po'i khab dang /
T10D4199:157b-9: rnam par rgyal ba'i grong dang /
T10D4199:157b-21: ka la sha'i grong khyer dang /
T10D4199:157b-24: ba ro sha ka ta ha dang /
T10D4199:157b-30: dngul chu'i gnas la sogs pa yul dang /
T10D4199:157b-38: tshul khrims can du ma'i yul /
T10D4199:157b-39: mi gnas pa'i yul gzhan dag na bzhugs pa rnams dang //
T10D4199:157b-40: gang dag sngon chad nyi zla'i 'od kyis ma phog cing //
T10D4199:157b-41: she sha sbrul gyi lus kyi 'obs gnas ri yi drung //
T10D4199:157b-42: de yi gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyis mun bsal ba'i //
T10D4199:157b-43: sa 'og tu ni ring bor ma thogs gshegs gyur dang //
T10D4199:157b-44: gang dag chu ltar sa la thogs med bye'u 'dzul mdzad pa dang //
T10D4199:157b-45: gang dag sar gnas phyag gi rtse mos zla ba reg mdzad dang //
T10D4199:157b-46: gang dag bya ltar nam mkha' la ni shugs kyis rgyu mdzad cing //
T10D4199:157b-47: na bza'i tha mas sprin mthar reg pas sprin ling 'jig mdzad dang //
T10D4199:157b-52: tshogs rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa'i ri 'jigs med dang bung ba'i ri dang /
T10D4199:157b-53: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal dang /
T10D4199:157b-56: shi ri kun pa ta dang /
T10D4199:157b-63: tsher ma can gyi tshal dang /
T10D4199:157b-65: chu srin byis pa bsod kyi ri dang /
T10D4199:158a-1: pho brang 'khor dpal yon can dang /
T10D4199:158a-2: bya rgod kyi phung po dang /
T10D4199:158a-5: gtsug lag khang gser ka ni shka sha hi /
T10D4199:158a-6: la sogs pa cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams dang /
T10D4199:158a-7: dharma r'a dzi ka mchod rten du ma dang /
T10D4199:158a-8: sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan khri yod pa bsod nams su
T10D4199:158a-9: gyur pa'i sa phyogs rgyun mi 'chad par klog pa
T10D4199:158a-14: tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'jug pa dag pa'i sgra bcom pa rnams bzhugs bzhugs pa /
T10D4199:158a-15: chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang /
T10D4199:158a-17: yo byad dang 'tshog chas rnams kyis legs par byas
T10D4199:158a-18: pas mtha' mtha' na chu'i gnas yod pa la nye
T10D4199:158a-19: bar spyod pas nyams dga' ba /
T10D4199:158a-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs kyis bcags pas gtsang bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi can /
T10D4199:158a-21: zhi ba thub pa'i skye bo gnas pa rnams na /
T10D4199:158a-22: de kho na bsgoms pa'i yid kyis ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa /
T10D4199:158a-23: tshe'i lhag ma gnas par mdzad pa rnams dang /
T10D4199:158a-24: gang dag glog 'gyu bya gag dag gis sku lus bkra byas sprin snum 'dra gyur nas //
T10D4199:158a-25: bkres pa'i sdug bsngal snod gyur mda' rtse rnon po lta bu'i spu yis rab gang zhing //
T10D4199:158a-26: bsgoms bas mig zha me stag bcas pa'i me rnams kyis ni kun nas lus bskor ba'i //
T10D4199:158a-27: yi dags gnam du lta ba rnams la thugs rjes steng nas char gyi rgyun 'bebs dang //
T10D4199:158a-28: rin chen bye ma'i phreng bas gya gyur dkrigs mtho la //
T10D4199:158a-29: dang khyu bag yangs gnas shing lang long nyal gyur cing //
T10D4199:158a-30: chu dang nye bas chu yi zer mas bsil gyur pa //
T10D4199:158a-31: ma na ya yi mtsho gling bsam gtan mdzad dgu dang //
T10D4199:158a-32: gang dag mi ro mang po'i sha dang khrag gi
T10D4199:158a-33: ro bro bas dga' bar gyur pa'i bya khva'i tshogs
T10D4199:158a-34: kyis gang bar gyur pa'i sa phyogs mgo'i thod pa
T10D4199:158a-35: gas nas tshil thigs zags pa'i snum gyis mched pa'i
T10D4199:158a-36: mes tshig cing / rang gi me lces shing bcer ba bskams shing rnyings pa'i lag pa dang /
T10D4199:158a-39: skra'i dum grugs kyis gang zhing /
T10D4199:158a-40: zla ba dri ma med pa'i 'od lta bu'i keng rus kyi phung po yod la /
T10D4199:158a-41: skabs shig tu ro langs byung nas /
T10D4199:158a-42: aa la la aa la la zhes sgra 'byin cing /
T10D4199:158b-0: me stag dang bcas pa'i @158b gad mo drag pos
T10D4199:158b-1: 'byung ba 'khrugs shing skrag par gyur pa ce spyang
T10D4199:158b-2: mi bzad pa'i kha nas du ba dang bcas pa'i
T10D4199:158b-3: me lce 'byung ba'i dur khrod chen po dag na
T10D4199:158b-4: bud med kyi ro sbos shing lto sgang nger gyur
T10D4199:158b-6: dga' ba'i bya rgod kyi mchu dang /
T10D4199:158b-7: sder mos lto 'brang cing lto'i nang na srin bu'i rigs rnams gnas pa /
T10D4199:158b-8: ce spyang gi stobs kyi shugs kyis drangs pa'i nang grol dri mi zhim pa'i dum bus 'khor la /
T10D4199:158b-9: bya khva bkres pas mig gi sha brus pa dag la gzigs shing /
T10D4199:158b-10: rtag tu mi sdug pa bsgoms te /
T10D4199:158b-11: gang dag kha cig ro'i gnas mal dong nas ni //
T10D4199:158b-12: khrag dang sa chags dmar zhing rtsub pa'i skra 'khyil dang //
T10D4199:158b-13: bya yi mchu dang sder mos mig rkong brus pa yang //
T10D4199:158b-14: mi ro bor ba'i lus la gzigs par gyur pa dang //
T10D4199:158b-15: sgo dang srang bar la lar me 'bar me lce'i rtse mo mang pos mgo rmongs shing //
T10D4199:158b-16: ral gri gtun dang rdo bas bsnun cing brdungs nas skye bo ku co 'don gyur la //
T10D4199:158b-17: gshin rje'i pho nya snying rje med pa sdod cig zer ba'i bzod glag sgras gang ba'i //
T10D4199:158b-18: sems can dmyal ba rnams su'ang srogs chags don phyir gang dag skad cig 'jug pa dang //
T10D4199:158b-19: gzhan yang sha ri'i mi'i dug mangs glang po che
T10D4199:158b-20: 'khrug pa'i mdun logs na yal ga bregs pa'i sdong
T10D4199:158b-21: bu yod pa phyogs kyi phar nas rlung chen po
T10D4199:158b-22: langs pas 'od ma'i tshal bskyod nas 'khri shing gi
T10D4199:158b-23: dra ba dang drud pa las me byung ba'i me
T10D4199:158b-24: lces shing mchog sna tshogs tshig nas /
T10D4199:158b-26: phag rgod mchog ma gyogs pa brgya phrag dag skrag cing mgo rmongs pa yod pa /
T10D4199:158b-27: shing lo mang po lhags la shing rnyings pa can bsil ba'i grib ma sang sid med ba ;
T10D4199:158b-28: nyams dga' ba'i longs spyod yod pa /
T10D4199:158b-29: nags kyi ma he dang phag rgod kyis me tog autpa la dang /
T10D4199:158b-31: sa ha ka ra bskyod pas chu dri zhim por
T10D4199:158b-32: gyur pa'i mtshe'u 'gram na shing la spre'u 'i khyu
T10D4199:158b-33: gnas pa nye 'khor gyi ri las chu rlabs mi
T10D4199:158b-34: drag par 'bab pas 'khor nas ne'u gseng mong pa'i
T10D4199:158b-35: sa gzhi yod pa'i 'brog dag na zhi ba'i bdag
T10D4199:158b-36: nyid can 'chag pa dang klog pa dang kha ton
T10D4199:158b-37: dang / bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa /
T10D4199:158b-38: gang dag bag med pa'i gnas dar la bab pa yol bar mdzad pa rnams dang /
T10D4199:158b-39: ri bo rdo leb che zhing yangs la rab tu snum pa 'dra gyur cing //
T10D4199:159a-0: glog gi phreng bar me tog yod la 'ja' @159a * //
T10D4199:159a-1: yis bkra ba'i bdag nyid can //
T10D4199:159a-2: chu bsil sprin chags rnams la chu 'bab zer phran chags pa'i rdzing ldan can //
T10D4199:159a-3: ser bus na bza' g-yo ba gang dag nyi ma'i gung la bzhugs pa dang //
T10D4199:159a-4: de bzhin du rtag tu goms pa'i lam nas 'dong ba'i glang bo'i khyu'i rmig rjes yod la //
T10D4199:159a-5: nags kyi ma he 'khrugs pa'i rvas grog mkhar chen
T10D4199:159a-6: po bshig pa'i shul gyi khung bu nas sbrul gyi
T10D4199:159a-8: nags kyi rlung 'gam pa yod pa /
T10D4199:159a-9: sa tshal stug po dang 'dam bu dang /
T10D4199:159a-10: shing ka sha stug po'i khrod na stag zung du gnas pa can /
T10D4199:159a-11: phag rgod kyi snas rlog pa'i gla sgong gi rtsa
T10D4199:159a-12: ba 'dzings pa ral pa ltar 'dug pa yod pa
T10D4199:159a-13: shing ni tsu la'i me tog brul bas rdo ba
T10D4199:159a-14: rtsa dmar bar gyur pa yod pa /
T10D4199:159a-15: shing gi phyogs su ri dags kyi khyu 'dam rdzab la thogs pa yod pa /
T10D4199:159a-16: shing lo sngon po stug por skyes pa'i dri bsung
T10D4199:159a-17: mang po yod pa'i gsher ba'i chu rgyun ngag tu
T10D4199:159a-18: mngon par dgyes shing dge ba'i phyogs ston pa rnams
T10D4199:159a-19: dang ; rin po che'i 'od zer gyis chu'i rtsa dmar bar gyur la /
T10D4199:159a-20: thugs bsam gtan la zhen pas dpag bsam gyi shing
T10D4199:159a-21: gi lcug ma'i rtse mos reg pa'i ri sbos kyi
T10D4199:159a-22: dad ldang gi sul na rtsol ba med pa gang
T10D4199:159a-23: dag bzhugs pa dag gang dag seng ge bsgyings pa
T10D4199:159a-24: yod pa ri dags rgyu ba dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:159a-25: chu 'dus te 'bab pa yod pa g-yos pas steng
T10D4199:159a-26: gi rtse mo ldem pa'i sngags kyis skar ma'i tshogs
T10D4199:159a-27: 'phangs pa / sa'i steng na lci ba lhun po
T10D4199:159a-28: yang lcug phran la bya ba bzhin du sgrim mi
T10D4199:159a-29: dgos par zhabs kyi sor mos sa'i 'og gi rmad
T10D4199:159a-30: dang bcas pa gsal bar 'phen pa dag dang /
T10D4199:159a-31: ting nge 'dzin thob pa gang dag char pa'i chus
T10D4199:159a-32: rdol ba'i bu ga du ma nas nyi ma'i 'od
T10D4199:159a-33: zer byung ba zla ba lta bu yod cing /
T10D4199:159a-34: rmang rdo dang rtsig ngos shag shig tu gyur pa'i mtshams su ba rgya chags pa /
T10D4199:159a-35: sbrul gsob rlung gis gang ste sgang der 'dug pa'i phreng ba rtag tu yod cing /
T10D4199:159a-36: nags kyi ri dags kyi lces tsha sgo rdul can rtsub po blngags pas /
T10D4199:159a-37: shing rtsa sed sid por gyur pa yod pa /
T10D4199:159a-38: rtsig rmang du srin bu go da'i tshogs ring nas gnas par gyur cing /
T10D4199:159a-39: sre mo mgo bstod de phyogs su blta bas byi ba skrag pa yod la /
T10D4199:159a-40: nang du rtsa sngon po stug po skyes pa'i 'jag
T10D4199:159a-41: ma'i drung gi gseb na phye ma leb rgyu ba
T10D4199:159a-42: yod cing / 'ug pa mang po sgra 'byin cing
T10D4199:159b-0: glu len ba lta bu @159b yod pa'i grong stong
T10D4199:159b-1: sus kyang ting nge 'dzin ma byas pa rnams na
T10D4199:159b-2: yod cing / / ston pa'i bka' nan tan gyis bsgrub pa rnams dang /
T10D4199:159b-4: gang dag g-yag gi rmig pas rdo bcag yod cing sprin ldings ldan gyur la //
T10D4199:159b-5: mtha' mar s'a la thang shing skyes la chu bsil mi khebs 'bab yod cing //
T10D4199:159b-6: bsam gtan zhen pa'i blos ni kha ba bab pas chos gos lci zhing zag gyur kyang //
T10D4199:159b-7: gangs ri dag gi ltong na 'gro ba shing gi drung du bzhugs par dgyes pa dang //
T10D4199:159b-8: nang na chu srin 'khrugs te g-yos pas nya rnams kun 'byer zhing //
T10D4199:159b-9: skam pas nyam chung gyur pa'i sprin btung kha yis chu 'thungs la //
T10D4199:159b-10: gshong du 'khyil bar sbrul dbugs phyung bas rba rlabs rgyun 'chad pa'i //
T10D4199:159b-11: rgya mtsho la yang mtshan mo brtan pa gang dag 'chag mdzad pa //
T10D4199:159b-12: snod gyur bdag nyid thugs ldan gtsang ma'i lhung bzed phyag bsnams shing //
T10D4199:159b-13: bsod nams ldan pa'i sku lus na bza' chos gos rab g-yo ba //
T10D4199:159b-14: de dag sang gi gdugs ni nam gyi gung du phyin pa na //
T10D4199:159b-15: gand'i brdungs pa'i sgra snyan skad gsang grags par gyur pa'i tshe //
T10D4199:159b-16: bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi de kho na goms pa'i
T10D4199:159b-17: chu blugs pas mi shes pa'i sems kyi dri ma
T10D4199:159b-18: bkrus pa'i mkhas pa'i tshogs 'dus pa /
T10D4199:159b-19: nyi ma shin tu mang po nas 'dris pa'i srid pa'i spros pa bcad pa /
T10D4199:159b-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab rin po che'i sgrom du gyur pa /
T10D4199:159b-21: dge ba'i tshogs bdud rtsi'i btung ba'i gzhi bro ba /
T10D4199:159b-22: ye shes kyi gser ma gtogs pa brdar ba'i brdar rdo sngon por gyur pa /
T10D4199:159b-23: legs par spyad pa stong gi tshogs bsags pas grags pa rgya che ba dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:159b-24: sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid can ston gyi nam
T10D4199:159b-25: thang lta bu'i yid dang ldan pa ming 'di zhes
T10D4199:159b-27: ma he'i rva ltar sngo zhing dri med mkha' las 'phur //
T10D4199:159b-28: gzi brjid kyis ni nyi ma'i 'od zer stong 'thor zhing //
T10D4199:159b-29: mngon du phyogs nas 'ong ba'i sprin ni dral nas su //
T10D4199:159b-30: skye bo phan phyir thub rnams song 'dir gshegs su gsol //
T10D4199:159b-31: rgyun mi 'chad par ting nge 'dzin dang /
T10D4199:159b-34: skye bo bla mal brten par mngon du dga' ba'i blo gros dang ldan pa /
T10D4199:159b-35: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi rjes su mthun pa /
T10D4199:159b-36: kha na ma thob med pa'i rig pa gsum rab tu sgrub pa /
T10D4199:160a-0: nyon mongs pa las grol bar 'dod pa'i dge slong gang dag @160a * //
T10D4199:160a-1: 'di na gnas pa 'dul ba'i cho ga la goms pa /
T10D4199:160a-2: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'jug pa zhi ba
T10D4199:160a-3: dang ldan pa de dag kyang ma lus par ci
T10D4199:160a-4: bder do mod kyi mtshan mo zad par mdzod la
T10D4199:160a-5: / 'di nyid du gnas par mdzod cig / thub
T10D4199:160a-6: pa'i sras mo shes rab zhi dang dul bas brgyan
T10D4199:160a-8: tha dad gling dang klu dang nags dang ri dags spros pa'i bsam bral zhing //
T10D4199:160a-9: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dri bral zhi 'os 'gro ba'i ma lta bu //
T10D4199:160a-10: de dag dgyes par mdzod la sbyin bdag phan par bzhed pas sang 'dir spyon //
T10D4199:160a-11: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa dang gnod sbyin gtso bo dang //
T10D4199:160a-12: grub pa rnams dang gang dag lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang //
T10D4199:160a-13: sangs rgyas ni rab tu dad pa'i lha mchog gang yin pa //
T10D4199:160a-14: de dag rnams kyang sbyin bdag 'di la phan phyir sang 'dir spyon //
T10D4199:160a-21: nam mkha' lding la sogs pa 'byung po rnams dang /
T10D4199:160a-22: stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang /
T10D4199:160a-23: dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba dang /
T10D4199:160a-24: sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba 'di /
T10D4199:160a-25: snod bzang po la sbyar ba dang /
T10D4199:160a-26: sbyin bdag chen po 'di la grogs bgyi bas nyid
T10D4199:160a-27: kyis dge ba'i yon tan skyed ba la dge 'dun
T10D4199:160a-28: nan tan mdzod cig / rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung
T10D4199:160a-30: bskyang ba la brtson par mdzod cig / yang dul ba dang /
T10D4199:160a-32: thos pas shin tu che ba'i 'phags pa'i dge slong
T10D4199:160a-33: gi dge 'dun 'dus pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo
T10D4199:160a-34: // lhun po las byung sbrul mgo lnga 'dra rdo
T10D4199:160a-35: rje ka na ka / nya dang gdugs dang 'khor
T10D4199:160a-36: lo dag dang lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' ba //
T10D4199:160a-37: padma gser gyi dpal ldan phyag sor dra ba srab mos 'brel //
T10D4199:160a-38: sen mo'i 'od kyis khyab pa rgyal ba'i phyag gis
T10D4199:160a-39: bskyab par shog / srid pa'i 'dod chags nyon mongs
T10D4199:160a-40: zhags pa bsal zhing sred med pa ;
T10D4199:160a-41: / chu yi chu gter lta bur yon tan rnams kyi gnas gcig pu //
T10D4199:160a-42: thub pa'i sras mchog dge 'dun bdag gis gus par spyan drangs pas //
T10D4199:160a-43: de ring dge ba gang bsags de ni byang chub
T10D4199:160a-44: thob gyur cig / ji srid mkha' la 'od 'phro
T10D4199:160a-45: 'od kyis gsal bas rnam par snang byed cing //
T10D4199:160b-0: ri dags @160b rtags can 'od kyi ral pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan la 'char ba dang //
T10D4199:160b-1: / rgya mtsho rgyas par gnas pa de srid lha dang lha min phyag byas pa'i //
T10D4199:160b-2: bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa thogs pa med par
T10D4199:160b-3: gnas par shog / gnas brtan spyan drang ba slob
T10D4199:160b-4: dpon bh'a ba skanda pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa
T10D4199:160b-6: / a'a ts'arya dzi na mi tra dang /
